name: Spiced Pumpkin
description: Pumpkins baked in simmering spices of clove, nutmeg and cinnamon, and sweetened with brown sugar.

name: Pecan Pie Bites
description: Miniature pastries, just right for sharing, with a sweetly spiced filling that’s loaded with toasted pecans.

name: Autumn Embers
description: The crackling embers of a bonfire bring fall’s favorite scents — apple, spice, and a touch of smoky firewood.

name: Balsam & Cedar
description: Balsam, aromatic cedar wood and juniper berry blend together in a fresh forest scent.

name: Apple Pumpkin
description: Cultivated with care...home-grown apples and pumpkins blended with ginger and clove.

name: Macintosh
description: So vividly real you can almost taste the unmistakable crunch of that first bite of apple.

name: Home Sweet Home
description: A heartwarming blend of cinnamon, baking spices and a hint of freshly poured tea.

name: Christmas Cookie
description: Buttery rich, vanilla scented, holiday sugar cookies.

name: Dried Lavender & Oak
description: Hand tied bunches of lavender mill about the woodsy scents and spices of an outdoor farmers market.

name: Christmas Wreath
description: Fresh-cut boughs and branches of pine, balsam and hollyberry.

name: Warm & Cozy
description: A beautiful bonfire night ends wrapped up in a soft blanket as you breathe in crisp, fresh notes of cedar, cashmere, and eucalyptus.

name: Harvest
description: A blend of cinnamon, cloves, and musk with a hint of sweet apples and pumpkin.
